trans-unit.source: The object where the event is raised, and the event handler is attached.
Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.

The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events.
trans-unit.target: El evento "SourceChanged" que este delegado representa controladores para no se expone como un complemento público [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] eventos, como sucede con los eventos enrutados más.

trans-unit.source: Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, "SourceChanged" es un evento enrutado que sigue siendo privado para el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infraestructura y se enruta directamente.

trans-unit.source: Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data are always the same object.
trans-unit.target: Dado que es directa enrutada, `sender` y <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> en el evento datos son siempre el mismo objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Puede agregar y quitar controladores para este evento a pesar de que el nivel de acceso privada del propio evento mediante el uso de los métodos públicos <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>.
trans-unit.target: El `sender` del evento será una clase derivada de <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>.
